author: Jon Turi
title: Officials sound alarm after crypto firm quietly disappears from controversial energy site: 'Disaster waiting to happen'
description: Pennsylvania alone is home to more than 330,000 of these wells.
content: Cryptocurrency mining firm Diversified Energy has abandoned natural gas-powered mining operations and associated gas wells in Elk County, Pennsylvania, violating local laws and endangering the enviro… [+3536 chars]
